thread.title: Record Store Day Announces 2017 Release List
thread.title_full: Record Store Day Announces 2017 Release List

author: Stereogum
title: Record Store Day Announces 2017 Release List
text: Record Store Day is looming once again, and today the organization has released the full list of 2017 exclusives. They include a Smiths 7" featuring two unreleased takes of old songs, some new David Bowie collections, a couple Prince singles, a first-time vinyl release for André 3000's Beatles cover made for a Nike ad in … More »
